action.text: Considered by Senate (Message from the House considered).
Considered by Senate (Message from the House considered).
Amendment SA 5102 proposed by Senator Schumer to Amendment SA 5101 (the instructions of the motion to refer). (consideration: CR S3028; text: CR S3028) To modify the effective date.
